text: Hi Pat Pope, follow these steps to resolve your issue 1. Navigate to the Design Manager by clicking on the Marketing Tab, hovering over Files and Templates, and selecting Design Tools from the menu.  2. Click on the "File" link which is located in the leftmost section.  3. Select the custom module you want to edit.  4. Click on the "Fields" tab.  5. Click on the "Add Field" button to add a new field.  6. In the "Field Type" dropdown, select "Logic Field".  7. In the "Logic Field" section, you can add multiple conditions by clicking on the "Add Condition" button.  8. Select the field you want to use for the condition, select the operator, and enter the value.  9. You can add multiple conditions by clicking on the "Add Condition" button again.  10. You can combine conditions using the "And" and "Or" operators.
